segments.text: I am sorry to tell you that you failed in the job interview in our company .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It is tough to accept it , I mean . But can you tell me why ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It is hard to tell . Maybe it is because you're not resourceful enough to be a manager .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I get it , and thank you for your honesty .
segments.speaker: S2
